channel.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder
channel.description:
im new to this stuff. ive only been on here for like 2 days. i used to have a server with my friend that we made from scratch but its been like two years and im completely blanked out. if i break a rule im sorry i dont know them. anywaays. this topic is about finding someone to teach me.
i learn better when its "hands on"... meaning it would help if someone made a server with me to help me learn it.
umm. i posted one of these posts in a "wrong section" and it got locked or whatever so i hope this is the right section lol :p
please consider...please

item.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“Project Territh, post:9, topic:260239”]I’m not an Expert, but I am decent at coding. I started a blank source about 1 month ago only 5% done but it’s a start. So if you want to work on a server together message me. i already have vps. so no worries about hosting[/quote]to bad dude lols im his coder already soz

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder

item.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder

item.description:

I’m not an Expert, but I am decent at coding. I started a blank source about 1 month ago only 5% done but it’s a start. So if you want to work on a server together message me. i already have vps. so no worries about hosting

item.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

Download a source, start seeing how commands work, then how methods work, etc, and you’ll figure it out.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder

item.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder
item.dc:creator: @gobabygo6 gobabygo6
item.description:
@gobabygo6 wrote:

jordiescape : my friend deleted it i hounded him for days to get it back) and it wass like two years ago. i made this acc when i was 10 im 12 now. we called it dreamscape (he claims he made it but i think he leeched) but im convinced he made it cause i cant find it anywere.

zillionair1 : i know but i cant edit it without knowing how to code. and im trying to get someone to teach me by kind of agreeing to make a server with me. i know a little, such as how to run it and which file to edit lulz. but i remember nothing of coding.

both zillionair and jordiescape : will one of you help me? just asking. if you wouldnt mind

Read full topic
item.source: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder

item.title: Need help from a reletively expirienced coder

item.description:

Just download a source and edit it alot. (Don’t leech the source)
